page.title: 04GOING TO WORK
page.content: My dad works in London at the Midland Bank.He gets to work by commuting from our house in Romford.He walks to Romford station,which takes him about 15 minutes,then he catches a British Rail electric train to Liverpool Street main line station in east London.It takes 25 minutes to get there.He then gets a red bus to the nearest bus stop to his bank. This takes about lO mins. It takes about l hour to get to work, if the trains are on time. He does this journey every weekday, joining thousands of other fellow commuters who use this route to get to their jobs in London. About 25% of the parents of the children in my class at Mawney Junior school work in London.
